00043 unsigned short NET::resolveService( const std::string& service, const std::string& protocol)
00044 {
00045     // Structure containing service information
00046     struct servent* serv = getservbyname( service.c_str(), protocol.c_str());
00047 
00048     if(!serv)
00049         // Service is port number
00050         return std::atoi( service.c_str());
00051     else
00052         // Found port (network byte order) by name
00053         return ntohs( serv->s_port);

00066 std::string NET::getInterfaceAddress( const std::string& interface)
00067 {
00068     struct ifreq ifr;
00069 
00070     ifr.ifr_addr.sa_family = AF_INET;
00071     std::strncpy( ifr.ifr_name, interface.c_str(), sizeof(ifr.ifr_name));
00072 
00073     int sock = socket( AF_INET, SOCK_DGRAM, IPPROTO_IP);
00074     if( sock < 0)
00075         throw SocketException("Couldn't create socket (getInterfaceAddress)");
00076 
00077     if( ioctl( sock, SIOCGIFADDR, &ifr) < 0)
00078         throw SocketException("ioctl failed (getInterfaceAddress)");
00079 
00080     close(sock);
00081 
00082     return inet_ntoa( sockaddr_ptr( &ifr.ifr_addr)->sin_addr);
00083 }
